text: phir yadi ve aapase vivaad karen, to kah den ki main svayan tatha jisane mera anusaran kiya allaah ke aagyaakaaree ho gaye tatha ahle kitaab aur ummiyon (arthaat jinake paas koee kitaab nahin aayee) se kaho ki kya tum bhee aagyaakaaree ho gaye? yadi ve aagyaakaaree ho gaye, to maargadarshan pa gaye aur yadi vimukh ho gaye, to aapaka daayitv (sandesh) pahuncha[1] dena hai tatha allaah bhakton ko dekh raha hai
